name: TripleTF Volatility Squeeze Mean Reversion FX
description: Mean-reversion system trading the most liquid forex pairs. It looks for simultaneous volatility squeezes on 1-h, 4-h and daily timeframes (Triple Timeframe Volatility Squeeze) and enters counter-trend positions when daily price is outside Bollinger Bands with volume confirmation. Risk is capped at 1 % of equity and exits use an ATR(20)-based stop. Profit taking is handled by the core signal logic (reversion to 20-day SMA or opposite squeeze).
